entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rain mixed with light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
